DOC.brief_summary: To compare comprehensive diabetes team care condition ( IC ) involve diabetes team 's use `` diabetes dashboard '' usual diabetes team care condition ( UDC ) access diabetes dashboard .
DOC.brief_title: An RCT Evaluation Diabetes Dashboard Team Model Primary Care
DOC.detailed_description: To compare usual diabetes care condition ( UDC ) comprehensive diabetes care intervention condition ( IC ) involve `` diabetes dashboard '' clinical decision support tool use diabetes team primary care . The investigator use parallel-groups randomized design . The diabetes team ( i.e. , diabetes nurse , diabetes dietitian , provider ) deliver 5-visit , 6-month intervention n=199 poorly-controlled ( HbA1c > 7.5 % ) Latino T2D patient ( mean age=55 year , 60 % female ) see 2 urban community health center . This intervention compare establish , in-house diabetes team care program ( n=200 ) impact blood glucose control key psychosocial outcome ( diabetes distress , depression , social distress ) .
DOC.criteria: age 18 year old , selfidentified Hispanic ethnicity , diagnosis T2D , HbA1c > 7.5 % , provider approval give patient participation inability consent , pregnant planning become pregnant next year , take glucocorticoid therapy , serious psychiatric medical complication ( e.g. , late stage diabetes complication , seizure , dementia , psychiatric hospitalization ) would prevent participation study activity .
